attributes.action: convert the millenium dome into a Star Wars (tm) theme park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Star Wars is now part of our global identity, a modern legend in the making if you will. With Storm Trooper "armies" marching at the Rose Parade, is it enough to have only a couple of Star Wars themed rides scattered around the globe. With the outside of the Dome remodelled to be even more Death Star-like (ie paint it grey), the Dome would become iconic again rather than be the white elephant it is at the moment. Inside, every fan-persons dream of a world dedicated to Star Wars... rides, lectures, films, shops, conventions ... everything Star Wars under one roof.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
